NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Hire of passenger cars with driver
NOTICE_DATA.n2016:PERFORMANCE_NUTS: Outer London – East and North East

CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 013EA

OLD.P: I.1) E-mail: marc.bassot@walthamforest.gov.uk
Further information can be obtained from: Matrix
E-mail: supplier.enrolment@matrix-scm.com
II.1.1) Title attributed to the contract by the contracting authority:
Dynamic Purchasing System For The Provision of Taxi Services and SEN Out of Borough Transport.
II.1.5) Short description of the contract or purchase(s)
— Provision of Taxi services to the Families Directorate for various transport needs,
— Provision of Out of Borough Transport Services to transport children and young adults with Special Educational Needs from home to school.
II.2.1) Total quantity or scope:

Passenger Transport for 8 or less with Passenger Assistance, Wheelchair Accessible Transport for 8 passenger or less with Passenger Assistance, Passenger Transport for 9 passengers or more with Passenger Assistance, Wheelchair accessible Transport for 9 passengers or more with Passenger Assistance, Ad Hoc Taxi services for 8 passengers or less.

Further information can be obtained from: adam HTT
E-mail: supplier.engagement@useadam.co.uk
II.1.1) Title attributed to the contract by the contracting authority:
Dynamic Purchasing System for Passenger Transport Services
II.1.5) Short description of the contract or purchase(s)
— Provision of Passenger Transport Services to the Families Directorate for various transport needs,
— Provision of In Borough and Out of Borough Transport Services to transport children and young adults with Special Educational Needs from home to school,
— Provision of Adults Social Care Transport services.
II.2.1) Total quantity or scope:

Passenger Transport for 8 or less with Passenger Assistance, Wheelchair Accessible Transport for 8 passengers or less with Passenger Assistance, Passenger Transport for 9 passengers or more with Passenger Assistance, Wheelchair accessible Transport for 9 passengers or more with Passenger Assistance, Ad Hoc Taxi services for 8 passengers or less, Passenger Transport (General).
